welcome_message_title: Welcome to San Sebastian de los Reyes
welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Sebastian de los Reyes, where the charming old town and vibrant cultural scene await you. Known for its beautiful parks, delicious cuisine, and lively festivals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights and some low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Barajas Airport, exclusively used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main hub for Iberia Airlines and its partner airlines, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, primarily used for long-haul international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow during peak hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
